summary: The WDD decomposes the TDD into 9 atomic work items with explicit traceability, acceptance criteria, failure conditions, and work groups covering incremental business-testable capabilities.

warnings.description: WDD-CLI-001-06 (CLI Integration) is the largest work item, wiring all four commands plus configuration resolution plus error formatting. It is within granularity rules (one PR, one subsystem, one outcome: working CLI commands) but is at the upper bound of complexity for a single item.

WDD-CLI-001-08 (Execution Loop) references 'kit execution loop prompts if available, or a built-in prompt structure' — the 'if available' introduces minor ambiguity about the implementation path, though this does not constitute a design decision.
